sentence: Did donald trump make the right choice when picking his running mate? it de-pence on who you ask.
explanation: The word de-pence takes on the meaning related to dependency based on who you ask.
first_new_sentence: The companys success often de-pends on their ability to adapt.
second_new_sentence: The project de-pends on the approval of the board.

sentence: What do you call an epileptic in a pile of leaves? russell.
explanation: The word russell is used here as a name and also refers to a rustling noise made commonly in leaves.
first_new_sentence: The rustle of the leaves signified the arrival of autumn.
second_new_sentence: As the leaves began to russell in the wind, I felt a sense of nostalgia.

sentence: What do you call a necrophiliacs erection? mourning wood.
explanation: The word mourning refers to the expression of grief but can also refer to the moment of awakening or arousal in the context of the joke.
first_new_sentence: She dressed in black to signify her mourning for her late husband.
second_new_sentence: The mourning of the community after the tragedy was palpable.
